net.sf.mmm.util.query.api.feature

Interface FeatureOrderBy<SELF extends FeatureOrderBy<SELF>>

  • Type Parameters:
    SELF - the generic type of this query itself (this) for fluent API calls.
    All Superinterfaces:
    StatementFeature
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JpqlSelectStatement<E>, OrientDbSelectStatement<E>, SelectStatement<E,SELF>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSelectStatement, FeatureOrderByImpl, JpqlSelectStatementImpl, OrientDbSelectStatementImpl

    public interface FeatureOrderBy<SELF extends FeatureOrderBy<SELF>>
extends StatementFeature
    StatementFeature for a Statement allowing an ORDER BY clause.
    Since:
    8.0.0
    Author:
    hohwille

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      default SELF orderBy(ComparablePath<?> path)
      Adds the given PropertyPath to the ORDER BY clause using default SortOrder (what should be ascending).
      SELF orderBy(ComparablePath<?> path, SortOrder order)
      Adds the given PropertyPath to the ORDER BY clause.

    • Method Detail

      • orderBy

        default SELF orderBy(ComparablePath<?> path)
        Adds the given PropertyPath to the ORDER BY clause using default SortOrder (what should be ascending).
        Parameters:
        path - the PropertyPath to order by.
        order - the SortOrder.
        Returns:
        this query instance for fluent API calls.

      • orderBy

        SELF orderBy(ComparablePath<?> path,
             SortOrder order)
        Adds the given PropertyPath to the ORDER BY clause.
        Parameters:
        path - the PropertyPath to order by.
        order - the SortOrder.
        Returns:
        this query instance for fluent API calls.
